ygData.subject: Re: Starting Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Just a quick update on a couple of things: The Small Scarab Breastplate is +1 STR, STA; -1 Dex, +10 HP, +2 vs. Disease. (You are a Halfling,
ygData.messageBody:
Just a quick update on a couple of
things:<br><br>The Small Scarab Breastplate is +1 STR, STA; -1 Dex,
+10 HP, +2 vs. Disease. (You are a Halfling,
right?)<br><br>The Gnoll Lariat is 3/20, but with AC of 3, and stun.
That's a nice thing -- you stun something while soloing,
you could actually swing around and do a backstab,
with good timing. Can't tell when it procs, however;
probably around 25 or so. Dropped by Tesch Mas Gnolls and
Gnoll Commanders in Split Paw.<br><br>The Dragoon Dirk
is another nice weapon for a Rogue (6/23, +2 Dex, +3
vs. Magic, fits in Range slot (just don't throw it!).
Drops off of Ambassador D'Vinn in Crushbone, who's a
nasty SoB. There will probably be very intense
competition for this weapon, if there isn't
already.<br><br>And heck, if you're there to kill D'Vinn, may as well
kill the Emperor himself for the Dwarven Ringmail
Tunic (AC12, +8 vs. Magic, Fire, Cold). <br><br>You
have been to The Safehouse, haven't you?!
(www.thesafehouse.org)<br><br>Go forth and backstab, young Rogue!<br><br>Kharlisht
